official_title: The Impact of Sodium and Fructose on Blood Pressure and Inflammation
inclusion_criteria:
* normal blood pressure
* males, females, minorities
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 45 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* high blood pressure
* body mass index (BMI) of > 30 kg/m2
* smokers or nicotine users
* pregnancy
